description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Field_of_StudyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Field_of_StudyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Field_of_StudyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A unique identifier used to reference a Field Of Study.

Field_Of_Study_Data.description: The name of the Field of Study  (this is required for add and non-blank on update)

CIP_Code__Workday_Owned_Object.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CIP_Code__Workday_Owned_ObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CIP_Code__Workday_Owned_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Field_Of_Study_Data.description: Provides a reference to the CIP code for this field of study.
Indicates if the field of study is inactive.  If a field of study is inactive, it will no longer be allowed to be selected when a worker adds an education.

description: Contains the detailed information about a Field of Study.
